tilesets.description: Terrain tilesets from TerrainTypes.ts - Wang tile format for autotiling

pending.upper: dark forest floor with fallen leaves

plants.description: Plant species from plant-species/*.ts - need 8 growth stages each
plants.note: Each plant needs: seed, sprout, vegetative, flowering, fruiting, mature, seeding, withered stages
